p: PROG-DOD: The preparation of PROG-DOD was similar to the PROG-CNA preparation. In this case, 4,4′-biphenol (186.2 mg, 1.0 mmol) was used instead of CNA. Upon the evaporation of the EtOH/water (1:1, v/ v) solvent, colorless block-shaped crystals were collected. Moreover, a sample of dimensions 0.07 × 0.06 × 0.05 mm was selected for an SC-XRD experiment.
